text:
A: Has anyone been on the moon?
B: The moon is so far away, we should focus on our society.
label: Red Herring

text:
A: Should gorillas be held in zoos
B: the natural habitat of the guerrilla is in jeopardy of not existing. Zoo's provide something of a to ensure survival of the species. Zoos may not always be ideal, but it is better than the alternatives.
label: Ad Hominem

text:
A: Do celebrities get away with more crime than non-celebrities?
B: Celebrities suck. They do just want to get more famous, thats all...
label: Red Herring

text:
A: Is it effective to censor parts of the media?
B: It is effective to censor parts of the media, because you never know who is watching.
label: Red Herring

text:
A: Is the legality of abortion desirable?
B: If you abort your child, you miss a smiling face, whenever you could cuddle him/her. DONT legalize it for more little happy faces

text:

B: Who can fully understand these computers? When i was a young boy, we sat next to each other and talked. Times have changed.

text:

B: But humans will suffer as major disasters will result as a part of nutural destruction(PRO)

text:

B: I think the society in general benefits from Social Networks.

text:

text:

text:

text:

B: The grading system used in high school is ineffective. So many kids strive in fields other than math and English, think of all the potential lost by failing them and making them lose confidence.

text:

B: Steve Jobs died, how can you offend him like that? This question is not arguable if you have some respect for the dead. He was the best. Noone can compete with apple.

text:

text:
A: Does school detention do any good in high school?
B: I think it can have an effect on students that will get them to correct their behavior, as they may be embarrased that the have detention. However, kids who get detention all the time end up enjoying it because all of their friends are in there and it becomes more of a playground, instead of punishment.
label: No Fallacy

text:
A: Should marijuana be legalized for individual use due to health condition?
B: Marihuana should be allowed as medical drug
label: No Fallacy

text:
A: Will flying cars ever become a reality?
B: Even if that were the case (which it sure isn't) you would be the very, very last person be informed that we can finally use flying cars. You know, just to save the world from your dumbass crashing into everything and everyone like you usually do.
label: Ad Hominem

text:
A: Should marijuana be legalized for individual use due to health condition?
B: Marijuana has been shown in some cases to alleviate negative side effects from chemotherapy treatments, even when other treatments for the same side effects were ineffective. Patients deserve legal access to medicines which, when prescribed by a physician, provide relief for their symptoms.
label: No Fallacy

text:
A: Should cellphones be used during class?
B: No, cellphone use should not be allowed during class. They only serve to distract from the lesson at hand when used casually in the classroom. There is plenty of time outside of class to use a cellphone.
label: Appeal to False Authority
